name: Graham Troyer-Joy
elevatorSpeech: I am an empathic, open-minded leader; a curious, pragmatic problem-solver; an artist who ships. I believe in big scary high-value goals and small, stable iterations towards them. I build and grow diverse teams where engineers can bring their best selves to work, learn from actionable feedback, and meet challenges together. I'm happy when I'm working my ass off, with people I trust, on something that matters.
